choices.C: Auto-suggestion for array objects that are useful for categorization of resource parameters
choices.A: Auto-suggestion for array objects that are useful for comparing between arrays
choices.B: Auto-suggestion is not available for array objects
choices.D: Auto-suggestion for array objects that are useful for comparing between array elements

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B

The auto suggest works with the operators = and IN . It is not supported for array objects.
Use cloud.type attribute to refine the search results.

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/prisma-cloud-rql-reference/rql-reference/event-query/event-query-attributes

questions.question_text: While writing a custom RQL with array objects in the investigate page, which type of auto-suggestion a user can leverage?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
.bat --> Data Classification
.apk --> Malware Scanning
.vb --> Data Classification
.py --> Data Classification

questions.question_text: Which IAM RQL query would correctly generate an output to view users who enabled console access with both access keys and passwords?

choices.B: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'aws-iam-get-credential-report' AND json.rule = access_key_1_active is true or access_key_2_active is true and password_enabled equals "true"
choices.C: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'aws-iam-get-credential-report’ AND json.rule = access_key_1_active is false or access_key_2_active is true and password_enabled equals "*"
choices.D: config where api.name = ‘aws-iam-get-credential-report' AND json.rule= access_key_1_active is true or access_key_2_active is true and password_enabled equals “true”
choices.A: config from network where api.name = ‘aws-iam-get-credential-report’ AND json.rule = cert_1_active is true or cert_2_active is true and password_enabled equals "true"

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Verified on Prisma.

Selected Answer: B
B

View users who enabled console access with both access keys and passwords:
config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'aws-iam-get-credential-report' AND json.rule = access_key_1_active is true or access_key_2_active is true and password_enabled is true

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/prisma-cloud-rql-reference/rql-reference/config-query/config-query-examples

Selected Answer: B
Only "B" is proper query on Prisma

questions.question_text: In WAAS Access control file upload controls, which three file types are supported out of the box? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCD
In the WAAS box, over Access Control option, there are the netx options:
1. Audio: aac, mp3, wav
2. Compressed Archives: 7zip, gzip, rar, zip
3. Documents: odf, Office Legacy, Office Open XML, pdf
4. Images: bmp, gif, ico, jpeg, png
5. Video: avi, mp4

B,C,D Then, There are the correct options

Selected Answer: BCD
BCD 

Built-in support is provided for the following file types:
Audio: aac, mp3, wav.
Compressed archives: 7zip, gzip, rar, zip.
Documents: odf, pdf, Microsoft Office (legacy, Ooxml).
Images: bmp, gif, ico, jpeg, png.
Video: avi, mp4.
